section.name: Support
section.p: If you need commercial support or professional services contact the project administrators below.

section.name: Documentation
section.p: First you should look at the documentation resources on this site.
Second you should see if there is something interesting in the FAQ.

section.name: Mailing Lists
section.p: The SignServer project has two public mailing lists hosted on Sourceforge. To subscribe to any of the lists or browse archived messages, click the links below.
signserver-announce A low traffic list about new releases and patches.
signserver-develop is used for development discussions of a more technical nature.

section.name: IRC
section.p: For direct chat for help and to meet the project administrators join the chat.
Connect you IRC-chat program to #signserver channel at irc.freenode.net.

section.name: Project Administrators
section.p: You can always reach the project administrators by email through Sourceforge.
